title: Presidio of San Francisco: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       The Inn at the Presidio is the only accommodations available in the Presidio itself. The inn is located on the Main Post, the "heart of the Presidio." In addition to elegant room accommodations and an interior design that celebrates the Presidio's rich past with artisan details and Presidio memorabilia, the Inn also features an inviting front porch with rocking chairs, a dining room for breakfast and evening receptions, and an outdoor deck with a fire pit.   There are numerous motel accommodations nearby the Presidio in San Francisco along Lombard Street.   Just across the Golden Gate Bridge, Cavallo Point Lodge is located in Golden Gate National Recreation Area in Fort Baker at Sausalito. Set in an idyllic location on the San Francisco Bay at the foot of the Golden Gate Bridge, Cavallo Point offers unique historic and contemporary lodging options. This elegant and environmentally sustainable hotel includes conference facilities, restaurant, and spa.    Hostelling International offers affordable accommodations in two spectacular locations near the Presidio; the Marin Headlands Hostel, and the San Francisco Fisherman's Wharf Hostel at Fort Mason.
